verses.name: 1 Samuel 12:21
verses.text: And turn ye not aside: for then should ye go after vain things, which cannot profit nor deliver; for they are vain.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 12:22
verses.text: For the Lord will not forsake his people for his great name’s sake: because it hath pleased the Lord to make you his people.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 12:23
verses.text: Moreover as for me, God forbid that I should sin against the Lord in ceasing to pray for you: but I will teach you the good and the right way:

verses.name: 1 Samuel 12:24
verses.text: Only fear the Lord, and serve him in truth with all your heart: for consider how great things he hath done for you.
